generate 1 question on skill data analisys, want below data in jason format:questions: list of question items with:
question_title
description
mapping_type (only depth of knowledge)
mapping_value (easy/medium/hard)
reason (why this mapping_value selected)
answers: list of 4 corresponding answer items with only one correct answer:
answer
correct_answer (true/false)
feedback
return your response in json

formdata.value:
Generate a 10-slide professional training course titled "Task Completion Monitoring Guide" for Industry: Healthcare, Department: Physiotherapy, Job Role: Physiotherapist, focused on the Critical Work Function: "Conduct client assessment and therapy planning" and the Key Task: "Select appropriate and specific outcome measures to enable evaluation of therapy progress and outcomes".

Ensure the guide helps physiotherapists monitor task completion, effectiveness, and progress across therapy sessions. Use formal instructional tone. Each slide should follow structured formatting with 35 concise bullet points (each under 30 words). Follow the exact slide-by-slide structure below:

Slide 1  Title Slide  
 Title: Monitoring Task Completion in Physiotherapy Practice  
 Subtitle: Focus on Outcome Measures for Therapy Evaluation  
 Mention Industry, Department, Job Role  

Slide 2  Training Objectives  
 State 3 clear objectives of the guide related to improving therapy outcome monitoring and task tracking  

Slide 3  Context of Task in Therapy Planning  
 Describe the relevance of selecting outcome measures in physiotherapy client assessment and planning  

Slide 4  Role of Outcome Measures  
 Explain types of outcome measures (patient-reported, performance-based)  
 How they contribute to evidence-based practice  

Slide 5  Criteria for Selecting Measures  
 Specificity, relevance to patient goals  
 Validity, reliability, cultural/contextual fit  

Slide 6  Designing Task Completion Monitors  
 Define steps to set up monitoring plans  
 Use SMART goals and baseline comparisons  

Slide 7  Tools & Technologies for Monitoring  
 Introduce apps, sheets, checklists  
 Include digital physiotherapy assessment tools  

Slide 8  Case Scenario / Simulation  
 Describe a patient case  
 Demonstrate selection and tracking of outcome measures  

Slide 9  Common Gaps & Mitigation Strategies  
 Discuss typical monitoring failures  
 Solutions: training, standardization, digital aids  

Slide 10  Reflection & Continuous Improvement  
 Encourage post-session reflection  
 Tie back to skill progression, supervision feedback  

End with a professional tone. Do not include visuals or design suggestions. Output only the textual slide content as per structure.
 return in json format
